head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BASS, MILTON A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BASS, MILTON A.

block.p: BASS-Milton A., 79. On October 9, 2000. Beloved husband of Marlene and father of Scott, Sharon, Robert and Paul. Stepfather of Robin, Alyssa and Kenneth. Pioneering food and drug attorney, and patron of the Metropolitan Opera. Services at Riverside Memorial Wednesday at 11:45 AM. BASS-Milton. From all the good you accomplished through your work to the incredibly beautiful love affair that you shared with mother. Your passion, generosity, spirit and caring will live forever through the poetry and love that you put in our hearts. We will miss you dearly. Alyssa, Ray, Isabela and Elijah
